sentence.Network_cn: 他使劲地晃动门把手，响声很大。

sentence.Network_en: I tried the doorknob and it turned.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试了试门把手，结果它转动了。

sentence.Network_en: My left hand brushed the wall and found the doorknob.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的左手顺着墙摸过去就找到了门的把手.

I siming seize doorknob , would not let go , and tears surge out dropped downward , she see me not let go , hold bonzi to hit my hand .我死命抓住门把，不愿松手，眼泪止不住地往下掉，她见我不松手，操起棒子打向我的手。

entry.def: A doorknob is a round handle on a door.

means.word_mean: 1. a knob used to release the catch when opening a door (often called `doorhandle' in Great Britain)

auth_sentence.content: He draws the circle of a doorknob and opens the door.
auth_sentence.res_content: He draws the circle of a doorknob and opens the door.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He draws the circle of a doorknob and opens the door.

auth_sentence.content: Of course, I also never learned how to say doorknob.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course, I also never learned how to say doorknob.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course, I also never learned how to say doorknob.

auth_sentence.content: Think about the direction you turn the doorknob of your front door.

sentences.en: I promised to repair the doorknob,but I had never got around to it.
sentences.cn: 我答应要修门把,可我抽不出时间修。

sentences.en: My left hand brushed the wall and found the doorknob.
sentences.cn: 我的左手顺着墙摸过去就找到了门的把手。
